sentence.Network_en: A confluent small - pox had in all directions flowed over his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 天花打四面八方汇合拢来,布满了他整个脸孔.

sentence.Network_en: This, in fact, represented two confluent basidiocarps.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 这表明是两个愈合的担子果.

sentence.Network_en: The outcome is a circular clearing, a plaque, in the lawn of confluent bacterial growth.
sentence.Network_cn: 其结果是在细菌化合生长的菌坪中形成一个环状清除区, 亦即溶菌斑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin confluent- 'flowing together', from confluere, from con- 'together' + fluere 'to flow'

auth_sentence.content: It's a fine red rash which becomes blotchy and confluent, fades after three to four days and may peel off after a week or so.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a fine red rash which becomes blotchy and confluent, fades after three to four days and may peel off after a week or so.
